title: Mark Hughes: McLaren F1 driver falls for Montreal trap... again
summary: When Norris's bold attempt to pass Piastri ended with a crash into the Montreal pitwall, it stirred memories of McLaren's infamous 2011 clash between Button and Hamilton at the very same circuit, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which McLaren drivers were involved in the infamous 2011 clash at Montreal?
What incident occurred involving Lando Norris during the Montreal race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A crash into the Montreal pitwall while attempting to pass Piastri
wrong_options: A collision with a rival in the first corner
A pit stop error that cost him time
A mechanical failure on the last lap

qa_pairs.question: What type of racing maneuver did Lando Norris attempt that resulted in a crash?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A bold attempt to pass another driver
wrong_options: A defensive move to block another driver
An overtake on the inside line
